extension.description:
Star+ es el hogar exclusivo para tus peliculas y shows de televisión de Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographica and ESPN.
Se requiere suscripción.

Star+ is the exclusive home for your favorite movies and TV shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographica and ESPN.
Subscription required.

Star+ è la casa esclusiva per i tuoi film e programmi TV preferiti di Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographice ESPN.
Abbonamento richiesto.

Star+ est la destination exclusive de vos films et séries TV préférés des univers Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic et ESPN.
Abonnement requis.
